text:
I filed for unemployment almost a full month ago. Was able to file online with ease. For whatever reason it says I have to call to finish my claim. 

I have been calling 900+ times every single day since then. Have not once got through to anyone. It's now almost a full month and I have been without pay and all my bills are due. 

I'm at a loss of words on what to do
title: 3 full weeks of unemployment calls...
